div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 2193 Selinunte, 1874 Burial: early 3rd cent. B.C.? (K) Contents: 19+ EL. Found with gold rod on shore at Marinella Carthage: st. (prob. Jenkins-Lewis Grp. IV-VII) Disposition: dispersed Cavallari, BullCommAntSic 7 (1874), pp. 22-3 Jenkins-Lewis, Carthage, p. 58
